title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 26.5 - Size of containers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 26.5 - Size of containers

State Regulations

No holder of an AP permit shall purchase or keep upon his
premises any alcohol, except in the original containers as received from the
distributor of a size not larger than five gallons; provided however, that the

State Liquor Authority may grant to the holder of an AP permit, permission to
purchase alcohol in original containers of a size larger than five gallons, upon proper proof being submitted showing the necessity for the purchase of
alcohol in such containers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
26.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
